sn55.74:1.1: “Mendicants, when four things are developed and cultivated they lead to penetrating wisdom.
sn55.74:1.3: Associating with good people, listening to the true teaching, proper attention, and practicing in line with the teaching.
sn55.74:1.4: When these four things are developed and cultivated they lead to penetrating wisdom.”
sn55.74:2.5: The Linked Discourses on Stream-Entry, the eleventh section.
